# Analyze simulation results

Run parameter setup code:

```{r}
source("functions_run_setup_sim.R")
```

```{r}
compute_power <- function(pvals, alpha) {
    pow <- sapply(pvals, function(pval_vec) {
        mean(pval_vec < alpha)
    })
    tibble(
        sample_size = as.integer(names(pvals)),
        power = pow
    )
}

get_results <- function(sim_results, alpha, train_sample_sizes) {
    ## Get true power
    pow_truth <- compute_power(sim_results$truth, alpha = alpha)
    pow_truth <- pow_truth %>%
        mutate(type = "truth")

    ## Get power estimates
    pow_list_upstrap <- lapply(sim_results$estimates_upstrap, function(res_this_train_n) {
        res <- lapply(res_this_train_n, compute_power, alpha = alpha)
        bind_rows(res, .id = "rep")
    })
    names(pow_list_upstrap) <- paste("n =", train_sample_sizes)
    pow_upstrap <- bind_rows(pow_list_upstrap, .id = "type")
    pow_upstrap <- pow_upstrap %>%
        group_by(type, sample_size) %>%
        summarize(
            pow_min = min(power),
            pow_p25 = quantile(power, 0.25),
            pow_med = median(power),
            pow_p75 = quantile(power, 0.75),
            pow_max = max(power)
        )

    list(truth = pow_truth, upstrap = pow_upstrap)
}

plot_results <- function(res) {
    p <- ggplot(res$upstrap, aes(x = factor(sample_size), y = pow_med, color = type)) +
        geom_pointrange(aes(ymin = pow_p25, ymax = pow_p75), position = position_dodge(width = 0.5)) +
        geom_point(data = res$truth, aes(x = factor(sample_size), y = power, color = type), color = "black", size = 4) +
        theme_classic() +
        labs(x = "Sample size", y = "Power", color = "Training\nsample\nsize") +
        coord_cartesian(ylim = c(0,1))
    p
}
```

```{r}
result_file_names <- file.path("..", "..", "data", "extdata", paste0("sim_results", 1:36, ".rds"))

results_list <- lapply(seq_along(result_file_names), function(i) {
    sim_results <- read_rds(result_file_names[i])
    results <- get_results(sim_results, alpha = 0.05, train_sample_sizes = c(1000, 2000, 4000))
    results
})

plot_list <- lapply(seq_along(result_file_names), function(i) {
    results <- results_list[[i]]
    param_set_index <- str_extract(result_file_names[i], "results[0-9]+") %>% str_replace("results", "") %>% as.integer()
    title <- paste0("DAG ", parameter_combos$dag_index[param_set_index], ". Noise SD: ", parameter_combos$noise_sd[param_set_index])
    plot_results(results) + labs(title = title)
})
```
